rows.label: qev087505_MSG0001
rows.name:
About the beam-cannon projectâ€”
is there any way we can push the output up another 800 G's?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0002
rows.name: I know it's a lot...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0003
rows.name:
But if we can manage it, I think we
could punch through Ganglion armor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0004
rows.name: This is why I hate talking to amateurs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0005
rows.name: Wh-what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0006
rows.name:
But Commander Vandham said
it might be possible if we solved a pair of issues...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0007
rows.name: What, so I have to explain it because he's too damn lazy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0008
rows.name: Hey![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0009
rows.name: It's Brenna, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0010
rows.name:
We know your time is valuable,
but could you maybe stow the attitude for a second?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0011
rows.name:
Look, this unit is meant for installation
on the back of a Skell, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0012
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0013
rows.name: Well then, you've got a real bitch of a heat-emission problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0014
rows.name: I'm just estimating here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0015
rows.name:
But you're probably looking at temperatures of over
400 degrees running from the head to the cockpit block.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0016
rows.name:
And that kind of heat will cook your sensors.
...Oh, and kill the pilot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0017
rows.name: The back-mounted unit just won't work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0018
rows.name:
And with its size,
it's not like you could change the offset-position to the arms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0019
rows.name: Er, unless we use different conductors in the barrel jacket.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0020
rows.name: In that case, the large size would actually work in our favor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0021
rows.name: Here, I made a sketch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0022
rows.name: ...Huh. Yeah, that might actually work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0023
rows.name: I mean, if we had a conductor efficient enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0024
rows.name:
But the only ones of this grade are all
being used in NLA's central power grid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0025
rows.name: Can't very well tear that apart to make a new gun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0026
rows.name: I guess not...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_JNK0010
rows.name: Concede

rows.label: qev087505_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Lin that she tried her best.

rows.label: qev087505_JNK0020
rows.name: Persist

rows.label: qev087505_SEL0021
rows.name: Insist that you can get around that problem.

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0027
rows.name: We're not done yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0028
rows.name: There have to be resources here on Mira we've yet to discover.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0029
rows.name:
Who's to say one of those can't be
turned into a new conductor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0030
rows.name: Maybe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0031
rows.name: There have to be resources here on Mira we've yet to discover.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0032
rows.name:
Who's to say one of those can't be
turned into a new conductor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0033
rows.name: Hey, that's it. We'll just build a new one![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0034
rows.name:
And you expect to just miraculously stumble across
this hypothetical material today?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0035
rows.name: Maybe not today, but that doesn't mean we shouldn't look.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0036
rows.name: I'm not giving up on this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0047
rows.name: Yes, what is it? You need me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0048
rows.name: I thought you were gathering materials for Alan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0049
rows.name: Take care of that first, then we can talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0037
rows.name:
Sure, there's rumors of ore from Sylvalum and Cauldros
with properties that make for an ideal conductor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0038
rows.name:
But unless you've got FrontierNav up in every corner
of those hinterlands, there's no way you're finding any.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0039
rows.name:
Probably an exercise in futility, but hey, it's your life.
Knock yourself out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0040
rows.name:
Well, assuming I take care of the conductor on my end,
you've still got the issue of the magnetic trap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0041
rows.name:
Hmm... And of all the tech staff here,
Alan would probably know the most about that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0042
rows.name:
He's a bit of a flake and his work can get...optimistic,
but he clearly knows his stuff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0043
rows.name: It's worth talking to him, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0044
rows.name: Things went well with Alan?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0045
rows.name:
Then this crazy new weapon of Lin's might just become
a reality.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087505_MSG0046
rows.name:
I'll do whatever I can to make that happen.
Meanwhile, why don't you hurry along and report to
Commander Vandham?[ST:wait ]
